solution_line_template: Between grapes and mangoes, we have {grapes_crates}+{mangoes_crates} =<<{grapes_crates}+{mangoes_crates}={grapes_and_mangoes}>>{grapes_and_mangoes} crates.
The remaining crates are passion fruits, so we have {total_crates}-{grapes_and_mangoes}=<<{total_crates}-{grapes_and_mangoes}={passion_fruit_crates}>>{passion_fruit_crates} crates of passion fruit
